def: to create art with your hands
ex: We make crafts in art class.

def: to make an image with pencils or crayons
ex: I draw a picture of my family.

def: to make funny pictures with stories
ex: He draws comics for fun.

def: to say words from a book
ex: We read aloud in class.

def: to enjoy board or video games
ex: We play games on Fridays.

def: to make music with your voice
ex: We sing a song in class.

def: to give food to others
ex: We share snacks at lunch.

def: to speak with your friends
ex: I talk with my friends at lunch.

def: to learn about current events
ex: Dad reads the news every morning.

def: to make music with a guitar
ex: She plays the guitar well.

def: to make a story with words
ex: I write a story about my dog.
ex_kor: 나는 우리 개에 대한 이야기를 씁니다.

def: to put seeds or plants in soil
ex: They plant flowers in spring.

def: to add color using paint
ex: She paints a picture of a house.

def: to give help to someone
ex: He helps his friend with homework.

def: to learn about numbers
ex: I study math every day.

def: to make the classroom tidy
ex: We clean the classroom after school.

def: to make a small copy of something
ex: He builds a model airplane.

def: to move your body to music
ex: They dance at the party.

def: to make a picture on a board
ex: The teacher draws on the board.

def: to make music on a piano
ex: He plays the piano every day.
